question.questionA: Woody plants; leaves narrowly lanceolate; flowers pale violet.
question.questionB: Rhizomatous perennial herbs; leaves broadly cordate.

question.questionA: Plants with short stout stolons; flowers fragrant, violet with a yellow or white throat.
Plants sparsely hairy; flowers dark or pale violet; lateral petals with white beard.
question.questionB: Plants glabrous; flowers pale violet; lateral petals without white beard.
